General.Name: Infinito Gold Ltd
General.Description: Infinito Gold Ltd. engages in the acquisition, exploration, and development of gold properties primarily in Costa Rica. It focuses on developing the Crucitas project located in northern Costa Rica. The company was founded in 1981 and is based in Vancouver, Canada. Infinito Gold Ltd. is a subsidiary of Exploram Enterprises Ltd.
General.Address: 700 West Georgia Street, Vancouver, BC, Canada, V7Y 1B3
